message: Is there a sale this weekend?

reply: No worries! A: Enter the code at checkout in the “Promo Code” field and click “Apply.” You'll be back in your account in no time.

message: Shipment delayed again; is there any promo for late deliveries?
reply: Hi there!  A: We offer Standard (5–7 days), Expedited (2–3 days), and Overnight shipping. Rates vary by weight and location. Let me know if you need anything else!
